Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface ILanguageSettings

  • public interface ILanguageSettings
    Allows the client to configure which languages will be included in downloads for HLS and DASH asset types The currently configured LanguageSettings can be accessed through the ISettings.getLanguageSettings call in ISettings. Modified settings are only applied once you call ISettings.setLanguageSettings
    CategoryTitle:
    006_config Configuring Virtuoso

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • hasAudioLanguagesConfigured

        boolean hasAudioLanguagesConfigured()
        Check if any languages are configure for audio tracks
        Returns:
        returns true if this set of LanguageSettings contains any languages for audio tracks

      • hasCCLanguagesConfigured

        boolean hasCCLanguagesConfigured()
        Check if any languages are configure for CC or subtitle tracks
        Returns:
        returns true if this set of LanguageSettings contains any languages for CC/subtitle tracks

      • addCCLanguage

        ILanguageSettings addCCLanguage​(String language)
        Add a language string to the set of allowed CC/subtitle languages
        Parameters:
        language - language string to add to allowed CC/subtitle languages
        Returns:
        the LanguageSettings object with the specified CC/subtitle language added

      • removeCCLanguage

        ILanguageSettings removeCCLanguage​(String language)
        Remove a language string from the set of allowed CC/subtitle language strings
        Parameters:
        language - language string to remove from allowed CC/subtitle languages
        Returns:
        the LanguageSettings object with the specified CC/subtitle language removed

      • addAudioLanguage

        ILanguageSettings addAudioLanguage​(String language)
        Add a language string to the set of allowed audio languages
        Parameters:
        language - language string to add to allowed audio languages
        Returns:
        the LanguageSettings object with the specified audio language added

      • removeAudioLanguage

        ILanguageSettings removeAudioLanguage​(String language)
        Remove a language string from the set of allowed audio language strings
        Parameters:
        language - language string to remove from allowed audio languages
        Returns:
        the LanguageSettings object with the specified audio language removed

      • allowAllAudioLanguages

        void allowAllAudioLanguages()
        Resets audio languages to allow all languages to be downloaded

      • allowAllCCLanguages

        void allowAllCCLanguages()
        Resets CC/subtitle languages to allow all languages to be downloaded

      • ccLanguageAllowed

        boolean ccLanguageAllowed​(String language)
        Check if a specific language string is configured for CC/subtitle download
        Parameters:
        language - the language string to look for in the set of allowed CC/subtitle languages If a null or empty value is passed, then the method will return true.
        Returns:
        true if no language strings are configured for CC/subtitle downloads or the specified language is present

      • audioLanguageAllowed

        boolean audioLanguageAllowed​(String language)
        Check if a specific language string is configured for audio download
        Parameters:
        language - the language string to look for in the set of allowed audio languages. If a null or empty value is passed, then the method will return true.
        Returns:
        true if no language strings are configured for audio downloads or the specified language is present
